name: @prestizni-software/dem-publisher
description: An solution for when making http requests is not a good solution
author: xx0055

scripts.release: xcopy .\AutoUpdateClientManagerClass.ts ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\tsconfig.json ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdatedClientObjectClass.ts ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\CommonTypes.ts ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdateManagerClass.ts ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\client.ts ..\client\ /Y && cd ..\client && git pull && npm run release && cd ..\src && xcopy .\AutoUpdatedClientObjectClass.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\CommonTypes.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdateManagerClass.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\server.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdateServerManagerClass.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\AutoUpdatedServerObjectClass.ts ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\tsconfig.json ..\server\ /Y && cd ..\server && git pull && npm run release
